alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 21 at 4:01AM MDT until May 21 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches over the mountains, and 3 to 7 inches for the Pueblo, Salida and Buena Vista areas. * WHERE...Lake, Chaffee and Pueblo Counties. * WHEN...Until noon MDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Heavy, wet snow could cause damage to trees and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft
